title: The Daily: Crypto ETPs log record $6 billion weekly inflows, Galaxy launches new crypto and stock trading platform, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: FIFA World Cup Blockchain Ticketing Platform Raises Swiss Regulatory Scrutiny: Report
contentSnippet: Swiss gambling authority Gespa is reportedly probing whether or not FIFA's right-to-buy collectibles comply with local gambling laws.

title: Morgan Stanley sets 4% crypto cap for ‘opportunistic’ portfolios, aligning with BlackRock, Grayscale
contentSnippet: Schwab and Vanguard are also starting to change their tune, signaling a gradual softening of resistance to digital assets.

title: Ex-BlockFi CEO Zac Prince Returns to Crypto Spotlight to Lead Galaxy Digital’s New Banking Platform
contentSnippet: Prince's BlockFi became a symbol of crypto’s lending boom and bust, offering interest-bearing accounts, before collapsing when FTX’s failure left it short of liquidity.

title: New Rules, Better Tools: How Crypto Is Maturing Through Privacy and Regulation
contentSnippet: From enterprise privacy to stablecoin design, builders at Token2049 say crypto is becoming defined by structure, compliance, and trust.

title: ‘The Future is Embedding Myriad as a Protocol’: Co-Founder
contentSnippet: Myriad brought its vision for the future of prediction markets to the Predictify Everything symposium at Token2049.

title: Crypto Lender Figure Shares Jump 6% After Bernstein Raises Price Target
contentSnippet: Analysts at investment firm Bernstein are forecasting a more than 30% increase from the Monday opening price of Figure Technologies .

title: Stellar Lumens Breaks Resistance as Traders Drive 3% Rally
contentSnippet: XLM climbed from $0.40 to $0.41 over a 23-hour period as corporate trading volumes tripled, signaling renewed institutional appetite for blockchain-based payment networks.

title: HBAR Advances 3% in Robust Recovery Rally Amid Market Volatility
contentSnippet: Hedera’s native token climbed 3% over the past 24 hours, breaking key resistance levels and sustaining momentum on surging volume

title: Grayscale Ethereum ETFs Are First in US to Add Staking
contentSnippet: Grayscale's new feature eliminates a major pain point for Ethereum ETFs: the absence of staking rewards for institutional investors.

title: PEPE Outpaces Memecoin Market as Whales Continue Accumulating
contentSnippet: The price jump comes amid growing whale accumulation, with top 100 PEPE addresses on Ethereum adding 4.28% to their holdings in 30 days.

title: Filecoin Rises 2% After Breaking Through Resistance at $2.37
contentSnippet: The token has support at the $2.31 level.

title: Vietnam Caps Crypto Pilot at Five Licensed Exchanges
contentSnippet: Experts warn Vietnam’s restrictive entry requirements and limited licensing could push innovation offshore.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana ETFs Surge as Crypto Funds Pull in Record $5.95 Billion
contentSnippet: Bitcoin soared to a new peak price over the weekend following a record week for cryptocurrency ETF investments, with nearly $6 billion worth.

title: Solana Company builds $530 million SOL war chest amid growing corporate adoption
contentSnippet: Forrmerly known as Helius Medical Technologies, the Nasdaq-listed firm now holds over 2.2 million SOL alongside $15 million in cash.

title: Bee Maps Raises $32M to Scale Solana-Powered Decentralized Mapping Network
contentSnippet: The fresh capital will be used to distribute more devices, enhance AI models that process and update map features, and boost contributor incentives, Bee said.

title: Strategy Buys No Bitcoin While Making $140 Million in Dividend Payments
contentSnippet: Strategy has made similarly timed pauses this year.

title: Joseph Lubin says ‘token-powered economies’ are coming to Consensys’ product suite, including Infura
contentSnippet: Consensys founder Joseph Lubin has said tokens are coming for MetaMask, Linea and Infura’s DIN in a broader, token-powered product strategy.

title: Ondo completes acquisition of US-regulated broker Oasis Pro
contentSnippet: A joint report from Ripple and Boston Consulting Group projects that the tokenized asset market could exceed $18 trillion by 2033.

title: PLUME Rises 25% as Network Registered by SEC as Transfer Agent for Tokenized Securities
contentSnippet: Plume is already receiving interest from 40 Act funds and is seeking more licenses.

title: Leap Therapeutics Shares Jump on $59M Winklevoss-Led Crypto Deal
contentSnippet: The penny stock name said the investment will be used to purchase cryptocurrency to be held on the company balance sheet.

title: Bitcoin Options Market Now Big Enough to Move Spot Prices, FalconX Says
contentSnippet: Options flows now shape price direction more than spot trades as institutions lean on Deribit and IBIT to position around volatility.

title: Stablecoins Could Lure $1 Trillion in Deposits Away From Banks: Analysts
contentSnippet: Stablecoins could drain $1 trillion from emerging market banks in three years as depositors prioritize capital preservation over yields, analysts predict.

title: Tom Lee's BitMine Boosts Ethereum Treasury Holdings to $13 Billion
contentSnippet: BitMine Immersion Technologies now holds more than three times the Ethereum of SharpLink Gaming, buying another $823 million worth last week.

title: AI/HPC Bitcoin Miners Rally as AMD Soars 30% on OpenAI Deal
contentSnippet: OpenAI’s multi-billion-dollar chip agreement with AMD fuels sector-wide gains across artificial intelligence and high-performance computing stocks.

title: BitMine’s Ethereum hoard swells to 2.83 million ETH after accumulating $821 million in ether last week
contentSnippet: BitMine says its ETH holdings have reached 2.83 million and $13.4 billion in crypto+cash, as corporate holders continue buying in "Uptober."

title: Bernstein initiates coverage on Figure with $54 price target, says blockchain set to transform credit capital markets
contentSnippet: The analysts forecast 30% annual revenue growth through 2027, with Figure placed at the intersection of crypto, trading, and consumer finance.

title: ‘No new orange dots’: Strategy pauses weekly bitcoin acquisitions near all-time high
contentSnippet: Strategy's holdings remain at 640,031 BTC, representing more than 3% of the total 21 million bitcoin supply — worth around $79 billion.

title: Standard Chartered estimates $1 trillion could exit emerging market bank deposits for US stablecoins by 2028
contentSnippet: Analysts says $1 trillion may shift from EM bank deposits to stablecoins by 2028, with outflows converging across countries in Africa, Asia, and LATAM.

title: Grayscale enables staking for its spot Ethereum ETFs in the US
contentSnippet: The crypto asset manager has also activated staking for its Grayscale Solana Trust (GSOL), which has yet to convert into an ETF.

title: Judge tosses lawsuit against Yuga Labs over failure to satisfy Howey test
contentSnippet: The plaintiffs failed to show how Bored Ape Yacht Club and other NFTs represent investment contracts under the SEC's 3-pronged Howey Test.

title: Early crypto gems: How to discover them first
contentSnippet: Spot early crypto gems in 2025 with five key checks — builders, usage, liquidity, token design and security — to avoid exit liquidity traps.

title: Bitcoin on TV: How shows like South Park influence crypto
contentSnippet: "South Park" is back to roasting crypto in its recent episode, but digital assets like Bitcoin have been a pop culture punchline for a long time.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest
contentSnippet: Google’s Gemini AI can help organize research, compare tokenomics and cut through noise. Here’s a workflow to analyze coins before you invest responsibly.

title: How to use ChatGPT to find hidden gems in the crypto market
contentSnippet: Discover hidden crypto gems using ChatGPT: GPTs, sentiment insights and data-driven scanners for smarter research and trading.

title: Base NFTs overtake rivals in sales count led by AI trading game: DappRadar
contentSnippet: Base’s DX Terminal NFTs ranked first in sales counts, having 1.27 million transactions, a more than 1,000% increase over the previous month.

title: Early Hyperliquid user sells airdropped Hypurr NFT for $467K
contentSnippet: Early Hyperliquid users have been rewarded with a massive Hypurr NFT airdrop, with the free digital cats now worth over $64,000.

title: Hester Peirce discusses her future NFT plans after serving at SEC
contentSnippet: She said she was joking about “becoming an NFT creator” after her time at the SEC; the commissioner signaled she was working “to get crypto policy right” first.

title: Vesting NFTs top daily sales volume chart: CryptoSlam
contentSnippet: Vesting NFTs jumped to the top of CryptoSlam’s daily sales chart on BNB Chain, highlighting demand for liquidity solutions in token lockups.

title: Ronin Treasury to start buying back millions of RON starting next week
contentSnippet: The Ronin Treasury will begin a $4.6 million RON buyback starting on Sept. 29, which is expected to reduce the circulating supply of RON by 1.3%.
